solution_line_template: If the restaurant makes {hot_dogs_per_day} hot dogs and {more_pizzas_than_hot_dogs} more pizzas than hot dogs every day, it makes {hot_dogs_per_day}+{more_pizzas_than_hot_dogs} = <<{hot_dogs_per_day}+{more_pizzas_than_hot_dogs}={pizzas_per_day}>>{pizzas_per_day} pizzas.
The total number of pizzas and hot dogs it makes in a day is {pizzas_per_day}+{hot_dogs_per_day} = <<{pizzas_per_day}+{hot_dogs_per_day}={total_per_day}>>{total_per_day}
In June, with thirty days, the restaurant will make {days_in_june}*{total_per_day} = <<{days_in_june}*{total_per_day}={total_in_june}>>{total_in_june} pizzas and hot dogs in total.
